about_the_game:
Soundtrack to the Chronique des Silencieux detective game.

Drawing influence from great composers such as Ennio Morricone, Michel Magne, François de Roubaix, Raymond LefevreBerto Pisano, Armando Trovajoli, etc.

If you're into library music, smooth jazzy tunes, soundtracks from the great 60/70's french and italian cinema, that soundtrack may be just what you need in your ears right now...
detailed_description:
Soundtrack to the Chronique des Silencieux detective game.

Drawing influence from great composers such as Ennio Morricone, Michel Magne, François de Roubaix, Raymond LefevreBerto Pisano, Armando Trovajoli, etc.

If you're into library music, smooth jazzy tunes, soundtracks from the great 60/70's french and italian cinema, that soundtrack may be just what you need in your ears right now...
